definitions: a person or thing that regulates something.
shortDefinitions: person or thing that regulates something

definitions: a person or body that supervises a particular industry or business activity
shortDefinitions: person or body that supervises industry or activity

definitions: a device for controlling the rate of working of machinery or for controlling fluid flow, in particular a handle controlling the supply of steam to the cylinders of a steam engine

examples.text: the driver had opened the regulator to ease forward

shortDefinitions: device for controlling rate of working of machinery

definitions: a device for adjusting the balance of a clock or watch in order to regulate its speed.
shortDefinitions: device for adjusting balance of clock or watch
